paragraphs.zh-tw: I was born in Taiwan. I grew up surrounded by different types of hardware stores, and I like going to night markets. I love the energy of the night markets, the colors, the lights, the toys, and all the unexpected things I find every time I go, things like watermelon with straw antennas or puppies with mohawks.
paragraphs.en: 我在台灣出生 我成長於一個擁有 各式五金行商家的環境 我也很喜歡逛夜市 我很愛夜市的那股活力 以及，它的五光十色和玩具 還有我每次去，所發現的新鮮事物 比如，插著吸管天線的西瓜 或者，擁有紅毛莫霍克髮型的小狗

paragraphs.zh-tw: When I was growing up, I liked taking toys apart, any kind of toys I'd find around the house, like my brother's BB gun when he's not home. I also liked to make environments for people to explore and play.
paragraphs.en: 成長歲月裡，我喜歡拆解玩具 任何我可以在家裡找到的玩具 像是趁我兄弟不在家時，偷拿他的BB槍 我也喜歡製作場景 讓人們去探索及玩耍

paragraphs.zh-tw: In these early installations, I would take plastic sheets, plastic bags, and things I would find in the hardware store or around the house. I would take things like highlighter pen, mix it with water, pump it through plastic tubing, creating these glowing circulatory systems for people to walk through and enjoy.
paragraphs.en: 這些早期的佈景裝置 我會使用塑料布、塑膠袋 以及，我在五金行或家裡 可以找到的東西 我會使用一些東西，像螢光筆 與水混合，灌入塑膠管 打造出這些會發光的循環系統 供人們穿梭及欣賞

paragraphs.zh-tw: I like these materials because of the way they look, the way they feel, and they're very affordable. I also liked to make devicesthat work with body parts.
paragraphs.en: 我喜歡這些素材，因為它們的外觀 它們的觸感，以及價格非常實惠 我也喜歡做一些可和身體部位互動的裝置

paragraphs.zh-tw: I would take camera LED lights and a bungee cord and strap it on my waist and I would videotape my belly button, get a different perspective, and see what it does. I also like to modify household appliances.
paragraphs.en: 我會拿相機的 LED 燈 和彈性鬆緊繩，繫在我的腰上 然後，我會錄影我的肚臍 用一個另類的角度 來觀察肚臍的樣貌 我也喜歡改裝家庭用品

paragraphs.zh-tw: This is an automatic night light. Some of you might have them at home.
paragraphs.en: 這是一個自動感應的小夜燈 在座應該有人家裡也有

paragraphs.zh-tw: I would cut out the light sensor, add an extension line, and use modeling clay, stick it onto the television, and then I would videotape my eye, and using the dark part of my eye tricking the sensor into thinking it's night time, so you turn on the lightbulb. The white of the eye and the eyelid will trick the sensor into thinking it's daytime, and it will shut off the light.
paragraphs.en: 我會切掉光感應的部分 加上一條延長線 接著使用模型黏土 將它黏在電視機上 然後我會錄我自己的眼睛 藉由我的黑眼球 混淆感應裝置，讓它以為是晚上 所以，可以讓燈亮起來 眼白和眼皮的部份 則讓感應誤以為現在是白天 所以，感應裝置會關上燈

paragraphs.zh-tw: I wanted to collect more different types of eyes, so I built this device using bicycle helmets, some lightbulbs and television sets. It would be easier for otherpeople to wear the helmet and record their eyes.
paragraphs.en: 我想要蒐集更多不同的眼睛 所以，我發明了這個運用單車安全帽 和一些燈泡及電視的裝置 以便於其他人戴上安全帽 以及，錄影他們的眼睛

paragraphs.zh-tw: This device allows me to symbolically extract other people's eyes, so I have a diversity of eyes to use for my other sculptures. This sculpture has four eyes.
paragraphs.en: 這個裝置也讓我得以 將其他人的眼睛圖像化 我因此擁有各式各樣的眼睛 可用於我的其他作品 這個作品有四個眼睛

paragraphs.zh-tw: Each eye is controlling a different device. This eye is turning itself around in a television.
paragraphs.en: 每隻眼睛控管著另外一個的裝置 這隻眼睛在電視機裡轉動著

paragraphs.zh-tw: This eye is inflating a plastic tube. This eye is watching a videoof another piece being made.
paragraphs.en: 這隻眼睛則對著一個塑膠管灌氣中 這隻眼睛在看電視，關於另外一個裝置的發明過程

paragraphs.zh-tw: And these two eyes are activating glowing water. Many of these pieces are later on shown in museums, biennials, triennial exhibitions around the world.
paragraphs.en: 這兩隻眼睛可以啟動螢光水的裝置 許多發明，後來都被展示於 博物館，雙年展，以及三年展 於世界各地。

paragraphs.zh-tw: I love science and biology. In 2007, I was doing a research fellowship at the Smithsonian Natural History Museum looking at bioluminous organisms in the oean.
paragraphs.en: 我熱愛科學和生物學 2007 時，我在史密森自然歷史博物館 鑽研一個獎學金研究 觀察海洋裡的發光生物體

paragraphs.zh-tw: I love these creatures. I love theway they look, the way they feel. They're soft, they're slimy, and I was fascinated by the way they use light in their environment, either to attract mates, for self-defense, or to attract food.
paragraphs.en: 我很愛這些生物，我很喜歡牠們的外型和觸感 牠們很柔軟，而且很光滑 我很著迷牠們自身發光的方式 在牠們的成長環境裡 不論是為了求偶，自我保衛 或者，吸引獵物

paragraphs.zh-tw: This research inspired mywork in many different ways, things like movement or different light patterns. So I started gathering a lot of different types of material in my studio and just experimenting and trying this out, trying that out, and seeing what types of creatures I can come up with.
paragraphs.en: 這份研究啟發我很多關於作品的創作方式 比如：作品的移動方式， 或者不同的光線變化 所以，我開始在我的工作室 蒐集大量不同類型的素材 進行實驗 試試這個，試試那個 看看我能發明出什麼樣的東西

paragraphs.zh-tw: I used a lot of computer cooling fans and just kind of put themtogether and see what happens. This is an 8,000-square-foot installation composed of many different creatures, some hanging from the ceilingand some resting on the floor.
paragraphs.en: 我使用了很多電腦的風扇 然後，試圖將風扇置入裝置 看看會發生什麼事 這是一個8千平方英尺的裝置 由許多不同的發明共同組成 有些吊在天花版，有一些則置放在地上

paragraphs.zh-tw: From afar, they look alien-like, but when you look closer, they're all made out of black garbage bags or Tupperware containers. I'd like to share with you how ordinary things can become something magical and wondrous.
paragraphs.en: 從遠處觀看，它們很像外星人 但當你走進看， 它們全部由黑色垃圾袋 或保鮮盒組成 我想與您分享，平凡無奇的事物可以 如何轉化成一些很神奇魔幻的事物

title: Shih Chieh Huang Sculptures That D Be At Home At The Bottom Of The Ocean
